imp.centralApplication
Class TextAnalysisComponents

java.lang.Object
  imp.centralApplication.TextAnalysisComponents

public class TextAnalysisComponents
extends Object

This class is meant to implement sigleton design pattern, provides single instane in return to the callling classes. it provides getter method to access information extracted for a given text through text analysis conponents like GeoCode, SentiCalculate, DisplayTokenization and NERextraction.

Author:
Harish Muppalla
